channel.title: Offramp on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Offramp on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End WY-414 North at I-80/WY-412
item.description: End WY-414 North at I-80/WY-414. Use I-80 West for Evanston; I-80 East for Green River. Continue north for WY-412.

item.title: I-80 West Offramp at WY-372
item.description: I-80 west Exit 83 offramp at WY-372/La Barge Road.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Exit 232 Offramp
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South on Exit 232 Offramp. Turn left for (Business Loop US-6) Downtown Helper. Turn right for Spring Canyon and West Helper.

item.title: US-12 East at WA-125 Offramp
item.description: US-12 East at WA-125 offramp. Merge left onto roundabout for WA-125 (spur) to Prescott and Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive
item.description: US-97 south offramp at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive. Use Oregon Ave. for City Center (Klamath Falls). Use Lakeshore Drive for Lake of the Woods

item.title: I-80 West Offramp at WY-372
item.description: I-80 west Exit 83 offramp at WY-372/La Barge Road.

item.title: I-80 East at Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 39 Offramp. Use WY-414 South for Mountain View. Use WY-412 North for Carter.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 3 Offramp
item.description: I-80 east Exit 3 offramp at BL-80/Bus. US-189. Turn left for the business loop into Evanston.
